project.title: Nomizo
project.description: Project yang masih dalam proses pengerjaan hingga saat ini. Project ini merupakan sebuah FGD (Forum Group Discussion) yang terdapat tiga role didalamnya, yaitu user, moderator, dan admin. Project ini merupakan Capstone Project yang dikerjakan bersama dengan lima divisi sekaligus, yaitu divisi User Interface/User Experience, divisi Back-End, divisi Front-End Web, divisi Front-End Mobile, dan divisi Quality Assurance.

screenshots.description: Homepage with navbar and hero element.
Homepage. Carousel with 3 top-rated products and general product listing.
Product detail page. Product description, review rating, price, stock status, quantity selector, add to cart button and review section.
Multiple products added to cart. Quantity selection and price updates.
Order summary including shipping address, payment method, order items, prices and total price.
Admin order edit. Mark as delivered.
